statement.p: A coffee distributor plans to mix some Queen City coffee that sells for \displaystyle\${13.00} per pound with some Gazebo coffee that sells for \displaystyle\${15.00} per pound to create \displaystyle{70} pounds of a new coffee blend that will sell for \displaystyle\${14.03} per pound.
How many pounds of each kind of coffee should they mix? Round to the nearest pound.
